title: Starting Late and losing a few crores
author: Admin
description: My first Salary was Rs 12000. This was my life’s first big income and until that point, This income had no expense against it.

title: Securing your future with Rs 5000
author: Admin
description: Earlier, we wrote a blog about investing 30K and earning an income of 50K every month. Most of them might have thought that they need such a huge amount to start investing. Nothing so! At Droplet, our wish is to be all-inclusive and that constant endeavor has resulted in this blog.

title: Reality about Realty
author: Admin
description: The state of our mind is in such a state that it takes a lot of courage to just state the facts since the facts we state have to peddle through the fake facts (aka lies) to reach it shores. The shores we are trying to reach are nothing but you  – “Readers”. And by the time, it reaches its shores, it is so confusing which is real and fake that the confusion swallows everything leaving nothing for the readers who await. We are afraid the knowledge is not crossing the shores! For the sails have not left the shores, not set forth towards knowledge. Alas!

title: A Tiffen for your Kid
author: Admin
description: I had get caught being honest rather than being caught lying. So let me agree, Out of sheer boredom and being a new user of Swiggy, I decided to pass my time off with some Swiggy browsing. There came my sister’s Kid
